shlok_hindi: अनिष्टमिष्टं मिश्रं च त्रिविधं कर्मणः फलम् ।
भवत्यत्यागिनां प्रेत्य न तु संन्यासिनां क्वचित् ॥ १८-१२॥
shlok_hinglish: aniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
bhavatyatyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit 18-12
shlok_english: The threefold fruit of action, evil, good and mixed-accrues, after death, only to those who have no spirit of abandonment ; never to total relinquishers.

defs.meaning: for those who are not renounced
